projects.name: SmileChain
projects.desc: Developed a blockchain-powered Website that rewards users for their smiles. Integrated AI for smile detection and Ethereum smart contracts to award Ether for qualifying smiles. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB, combining AI and blockchain for a fun and engaging user experience.

projects.name: Contact Manager
projects.desc: A secure web application for user authentication and personal contact management. Users can register, log in, and manage their own contact lists, with data stored in a MongoDB database. Implemented the frontend using React and the backend with Node.js, Express, and JWT-based authentication.

projects.name: NIST Patrika
projects.desc: Designed and developed the frontend of a web-based newsletter platform to showcase institutional news and articles. Built using React, with a focus on responsive design, intuitive navigation, and dynamic content presentation.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.desc: Developed a dynamic and responsive personal CV website using React. All data is sourced from a JSON file, enabling effortless content management and updates. The site features intuitive navigation, smooth transitions, and a clean UI/UX design.Optimized for various devices and screen sizes to ensure a consistent user experience.

projects.name: Flicker
projects.below: IOT based LED colour changing Android APP
projects.desc: Created an Android application using Jetpack Compose and Google Firebase to manage LED lighting systems. Hardware implementation utilizes an ESP32 microcontroller for color control, enabling real-time adjustments and dynamic lighting effects.

projects.name: PokerPay
projects.desc: Developed a fully operational Android application to simulate the transaction of points between players during real poker matches. The app supports multiple games running in parallel seamlessly, ensuring smooth functionality and reliability. Built with Jetpack Compose and integrated with Google Firebase for real-time data synchronization.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe Game
projects.desc: Built a Tic Tac Toe game using HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for game logic. Implemented an algorithm to strategically select the computer's moves based on the current board configuration. Features responsive design for optimal play on different screen sizes. Includes game state management and win/draw condition detection.

about: As a dedicated B.Tech student, I am seeking an entry-level opportunity where I can apply my skills & enhance learning in the field of work. With proficiency in languages such as C, Java, Kotlin, and Python, I am committed to leveraging my knowledge to contribute effectively to real-world projects.
why_me: I bring a strong foundation in problem-solving and communication, coupled with hands-on experience in developing innovative web, mobile, and blockchain-based applications. My ability to learn quickly and adapt to new tools, makes me a valuable team player ready to tackle complex challenges and drive innovation.

developmentSkill: Full-stack web application, Blockchain application, IoT project, and Android application development experience. Skilled in front-end, back-end, and cloud technologies, including Firebase and MongoDB, for dynamic and secure applications with real-time databases. Experienced in blockchain technologies such as Ethereum, Solidity, and Web3.js. Proficient in Android development using Java and Kotlin, with a focus on building efficient and scalable mobile applications. Proven ability to integrate diverse platforms for high-performance, cross-functional applications.
contact: I'm always looking for exciting collaborations and new projects. If you're facing a creative challenge or have an idea you'd like to develop, I'd be thrilled to discuss how I can help bring it to life. I'm available for hire on a freelance basis and am also open to exploring full-time opportunities. Feel free to email me with any questions or opportunities you'd like to discuss. I'm open to various types of projects and collaborations.
